metadata.title: CVE-2019-9704 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
Vixie Cron before the 3.0pl1-133 Debian package allows local users to cause a denial of service (daemon crash) via a large crontab file because the calloc return value is not checked.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-9704` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cron - 3.0pl1-134ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cron package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0pl1-134ubuntu1').
